description.value: You're accustomed to surviving in the harsh, arid deserts of Akiton, and can endure the blazing heat of the midday sun. You gain fire resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1), and environmental heat effects are one step less extreme for you (incredible heat becomes extreme, extreme heat becomes severe, and so on). In addition, increase the number of days you can go without food or water before you begin to starve by 1 month.
